section.title: Everything You Need to Know About
section.description: Find answers to frequently asked questions about IPO and our services.

questions.question: What are the main requirements for IPO in Indonesia?

answer.intro: Main IPO requirements in Indonesia include:
points: Minimum paid-up capital of IDR 3 billion
Audited financial statements for the last 3 years

questions.question: How long does the IPO process take?
questions.answer: The IPO process in Indonesia generally takes 6-12 months, depending on company readiness and market conditions. Stages include internal preparation (3-6 months), OJK regulatory process (2-3 months), and offering period until listing (1-2 months).

questions.question: Does a company need to be profitable for IPO?
questions.answer: Not necessarily. While profitability increases investor appeal, OJK doesn't require companies to be profitable. What's important is clear business prospects, good governance, and transparency in financial reporting.

questions.question: What are the main stages in the IPO process?
How is the IPO share price determined?
questions.answer: IPO share price is determined through bookbuilding process considering company valuation, market conditions, investor interest, and comparison with similar companies. Underwriters will help determine optimal price range.

questions.question: What services does Global Sinergi Kapital provide?
How much does IPO consultant service cost?
questions.answer: IPO consultation fees vary depending on company complexity and size. GSK offers various packages from initial evaluation to full assistance. We can provide a custom proposal after initial assessment.

questions.question: What are company obligations after IPO?

obligations: Compliance with OJK and IDX regulations

questions.question: Does GSK provide post-IPO services?
questions.answer: Yes, GSK provides post-IPO support services including corporate action advisory, periodic report preparation assistance, investor relations, and ongoing regulatory compliance consultation.
